title: Ensolite SCC (PVC/NBR/CR)
fileContent: Typical Properties of EnsoLite® SCC Polymer PVC/NBR ASTMD1056 Classification 2C3/2C4 ASTM D1056 Suffix Compliances B3, C1, F1, M Physical Property Test Method   Result (USUnits)   Result (Metric Units) Density ASTMD1056 10 –15 pcf 160.1 –240.3 kg/m 3 Compression Deflection 25% ASTM D1056 9 –15 psi 62 –103.4 kPa CompressionSet 50% ASTM D1056 20% Max 20% Max Water Absorption ASTM D1056 5% Max 5% Max Tensile Strength ASTMD412 150 psi Min 1034 kPaMin Elongation ASTM D412 125% Min 125% Min Fluid Immersion ASTM D1056 250% max 250% max CD after Oven Aging ASTM D1056 30% Max 30% Max Flammability FMVSS-302 Pass Service Temperature -40 to 200 F Disclaimer: This information is furnished as a guide for selecting materials.
